bill.title: Regional economic development alliances; extend authority to exercise quick-take eminent domain.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 11-27-81, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Time Within Which Regional Economic Development Alliances Created Under The Regional Economic Development Act May Exercise The Right Of Immediate Possession With Regard To Certain Projects Under The Mississippi Major Economic Impact Act; To Amend Section 57-64-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On The Authority Of Regional Economic Development Alliances Created Under The Regional Economic Development Act To Acquire Property By Quick-take Eminent Domain Or Condemnation With Regard To Certain Projects Under The Mississippi Major Economic Impact Act; And For Related Purposes.
